definition: to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: The waiting-room was gloomy, of course, and it smelled badly.
sentences.chinese: 候車室陰沉沉的，那個味兒如一慣地難聞。

sentences.english: It was in the waiting room of the railway station that I met my English teacher for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 我是在火車站候車室裏第一次見到我的英語老師的。

sentences.english: The porter ushered us into the waiting-room.
sentences.chinese: 服務員帶我們到候車室。

sentences.english: I saw a girl who was sleeping in the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 在候車室我看見一個熟睡的女孩。

sentences.english: Let's go to the waiting room and take a rest.
sentences.chinese: 我們到候車室去休息一下吧。

sentences.english: It was cold on the railway platform so we hurried into the warm waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 月臺很冷，所以我們趕緊躲到溫暖的候車室。

sentences.english: The waiting room is crowded with passengers waiting for the bus to come.
sentences.chinese: 候車室裏擠滿了等着車來的乘客。

sentences.english: They carefully designed that the two trunks exactly alike would be switched in the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 他們精心設計了在候車室調換兩隻相同行李箱的方法。

sentences.english: Most stations we'vebeen to also have special soft-ticket waiting areas.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數車站，我們還可以享受專門的軟臥候車室。

sentences.english: You can't go into the waiting room without a train ticket.
sentences.chinese: 你沒有火車票，不能進入候車室。

sentences.english: And please don't smoke in the waiting-room.
sentences.chinese: 請不要在候車室吸菸，謝謝。

sentences.english: The sky is fluttering the tiny snowflakes, I saw in the waiting room roof is white.
sentences.chinese: 天空飄着細小的雪花，我看到候車室的屋頂是白的。

sentences.english: We sat in the station's waiting-room until evening.
sentences.chinese: 我們在車站候車室等到晚上。

sentences.english: The area and number of waiting rooms are the two essential indexes in design.
sentences.chinese: 候車室面積和數量是客運站設計時須考慮的指標。

sentences.english: Usually there's a waiting room in the station.
sentences.chinese: 通常火車站裏有候車室。

sentences.english: He lay quietly in the waiting-room for an hour.
sentences.chinese: 他在候車室裏靜靜地等了一個小時。

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
